thread.title_full: NSU SAA Hosts Celebrate Sound (Feb 17) – NSU SharkFINS

author: Studentaffairsmkt
title: NSU SAA Hosts Celebrate Sound (Feb 17) – NSU SharkFINS
text: Join the NSU Student Academy of Audiology in their initiative to promote hearing awareness by participating in Celebrate Sound! When: Saturday, February 17, 2024 Location: Topeekeegee Yugnee Park 3300 North Park Road Hollywood, FL 33021 Time: 9:00 a.m. – 1:00 p.m. This walkathon aims to raise funds for the Hearing Charities of America’s hearing aid project. The event includes complimentary hearing screenings and welcomes participants of all ages to a day filled with fun activities. Attendees can enjoy silent auctions, games, and indulge in snacks and beverages. Registration is $25 for adults and $15 for children. All proceeds will contribute to the Hearing Charities of America’s cause. Click here [for additional details and to register](https://nam10.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fp2p.onecause.com%2Fcelebratesoundfortlauderdale&data=05%7C02%7Cposterprinting%40nova.edu%7C1cb53bc75e1e42209d9d08dc0d708472%7C2c2b2d312e3e4df1b571fb37c042ff1b%7C1%7C0%7C638400024122361290%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=1Zn%2BbUIsGgmvLK4WR4BnNbHToPmoBLxYvbvXrPiIHw4%3D&reserved=0) Let’s come together to Celebrate Sound and make a difference!
